chapter.title: Prepare a disk for cloning with the system cleanup tool

abstract.para: The clone-master-clean-up tool that comes with &productname; makes it possible to remove data from the disk that you don't what to include in a clone. This chapter describes how to use the tool.

sect1.title: Cleaning up unique system identifiers

warning.title: Do not use the tool on a production system
warning.para: As the cleanup tool removes essential system configuration data, it is not recommended to use it on a system that is used in production. Run the tool on the cloned image instead.
